rules.name: Not_all_Validations_Passed
rules.conditionLogic: 1 OR 2 OR 3 OR (4 AND 5 AND 8 AND 10 AND 11) OR (6 AND 7 AND 9) OR (12 AND NOT(9))
rules.label: Not all Validations Passed

Flow.description: IDC - Sep 19, 2022 - SFCPQBLG-739 - Added in validation to confirm no Quotes without QLi can be submitted for approval. ATG - Feb 1, 2022 - SFCPQBLG-795 - Added in validation to confirm QLCS exist for all usage products IDC- Jan 30,2022 - SFCPQBLG-660 - Payments Pricing Established field ATG - Nov 2, 2021 - SFCPQBLG-499 - AM: Added criteria so that Amendments do not go for Payments Approval ATG - September 21, 2021 - SFCPQBLG-437 - Updated EDC product code on EDC QL get component ATG - September 15, 2021 - SFCPQBLG-437 - Update to File upload to accommodate EDC, added check on AE+PP parent for EDC ATG - September 15, 2021 - SFCPQBLG-440 - Improvement in Upload doc process ATG - Sept 9, 2021 - Added Condition Get Payments Sites so that only Multi Site records are selected ATG - Aug 30, 2021 - Added Status Update for Payments Approval submission ATG - August 5, 2021 - SFCPQBLG-355 - Added a validation for child quotes when submitting a child quote. ATG - July 15, 2021 - Updated error message for a PP Only or AE+PP Parent is submitted for approval and their Deliver to Site doesn't exist as an NCR Payments Site record. ATG - July 7, 2021 - Fix Interchange recall decision ATG - July 1, 2021 - AE Only Has Payments error, other cleanup ATG - June 30, 2021 - add new errors for AE+PP child and parent paths ATG - June 29, 2021 - Updated check for existence of payments processing product to utilize new Payments Solution field. Updates to conditionally display logic on payments screen components. Deleted extra decision for payments first approval check ATG - June 28, 2021 - Fixed error message for AE Only quotes where Payments type isn't No Payments; Incorporated Payments First ATG - June 25, 2021 - Fixed Amendment Cancelled check for AE+PP Child quotes with payments ATG - June 23, 2021 - Updated Deliver to Site is null error ATG - June 22, 2021 - Payment type for Amended and Cancelled ATG - June 17, 2021 - Check deliver to site is part of NCR payment sites ATG - June 11, 2021 - Multisite scenarios ATG - May 27, 2021 - Removed AE+PP path ATG - May 19, 2021- Multi-site Updates

formulas.name: IsInterchangeQuoteSubmittedForPaymentApproval
formulas.expression: AND ( TEXT({!Get_Quote.qtc_Payments_Solution__c}) ='Payments First - Interchange' , TEXT({!Get_Quote.SBQQ__Type__c}) != 'Amendment' , IF ( IsBlank({!Get_Quote.Payments_Approval__c}),TRUE, OR ( TEXT({!Get_Payments_Approval.ApprovalStatus__c}) = 'Recalled', TEXT({!Get_Payments_Approval.ApprovalStatus__c}) = 'Rejected') ) )

Flow.label: Submit Quote for Approval Flow

screens.label: Error: AE has Payment Site Records

fields.name: errorAEPaymentSiteRecords
fields.fieldText: Error: Quote cannot have NCR Payments Site records in its current multi-site configuration. Either delete or update its configuration.

fields.name: errorAEOnlyHasPayments
fields.fieldText: Error: Payments type must be set to "No Payments" on AE Only Quotes

screens.name: Error_All_Sites_Must_Be_Populated
screens.label: Error All Sites Must Be Populated

fields.name: errorAllSItesMustBePopulated
fields.fieldText: Error: All site information must be populated prior to submitting for approval.

fields.name: ErrorAlohaEssential
fields.fieldText: Error: Quote is not allowed to have Aloha Essentials 2.0 in its current multi-site configuration. Either remove or update its configuration

fields.name: errorMessageChildQuoteWIthChildren
fields.fieldText: The submitted quote has related child quotes. Please disassociate the child quotes before proceeding.

screens.name: Error_Child_Quote_with_NO_Payments_Deliver_to_site_in_Parent
screens.label: Error: Child Quote with NO Payments Deliver to site in Parent

fields.name: errorNoPaymentChildQuoeDeliverToSite
fields.fieldText: Error: Child Quotes where Payment Type = "No Payments" cannot have their Deliver to Site listed in the Multi-Site parent NCR Payments Sites list

screens.name: Error_Deliver_To_Site_Not_In_NCR_Payment_Site
screens.label: Error: Deliver To Site Not In NCR Payment Site

fields.name: errorDeliverToSIte
fields.fieldText: Error: The Deliver to Site on this quote must be created as an NCR Payment Site before this quote can be submitted for approval.

fields.name: errorNCRDuplicatePaymentSItes
fields.fieldText: Error: Duplicate NCR Payments Site detected. Please remove the duplicate before continuing

fields.name: ErrorAlohaEssential_0
fields.fieldText: Error: Quote is not allowed to have NCR Payments - EDC Promo in its current multi-site configuration. Either remove or update its configuration

fields.name: ErrorInvalidMultisiteParent
fields.fieldText: Error: Multi-Site Parent Quote is Invalid.

screens.name: Error_Multi_Site_Parent_must_be_Populated
screens.label: Error Multi Site Parent must be Populated

fields.name: ErrorMultiSiteParentPopulated
fields.fieldText: Error: Multi-Site Parent Quote field must be populated.

fields.name: errorNCRParentPaymentSite
fields.fieldText: Error: A NCR Payment Site record must be created on the parent quote before this quote can be submitted for approval.

fields.name: ErrorNCRPaymentProcessing
fields.fieldText: Error: Quote is not allowed to have NCR Payments Processing in its current multi-site configuration. Either remove or update its configuration

screens.description: Parent Payment Quote has not been approved

screens.label: Error: Parent Payment Approval

fields.name: errorParentPaymentQuote
fields.fieldText: Error: Parent payment quote must be approved before the quote can be submitted for approval

fields.name: errorParentQuoteAmendmentCancelled
fields.fieldText: Error: Payments type must be set to "No Payments" when parent payment quote has been amended and cancelled.

Error: One of the Usage Products is missing a consumption schedule.


Please delete and rebuild your bundle ensuring you save immediately after cloning, prior to reconfiguring.
